name: Midas msyrupUSD
description: msyrupUSD is a tokenised certificate issued by Midas Software GmbH that provides exposure to a yield‑generating strategy based on the stablecoin collateral portfolio of Maple Finance. This product is structured as a debt‑instrument, tracking a dynamically managed basket of on‑chain assets and credit allocations. The redemption value is based on the net asset value (NAV) of the underlying portfolio, after a fixed tracking‑error allowance and applicable management and performance fees.
